bridge-type.label: jSupla Server
bridge-type.description: This is native Supla server that connects with devices.

parameter.name: serverAccessId
parameter.label: Server Access ID
parameter.description: This is ID that devices will use to register to your server.

parameter.name: serverAccessIdPassword
parameter.label: Server Access ID Password
parameter.description: This is password required to register to your server.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Server port
parameter.description:
Port on which server should listen. Common ports are:
  1. 2016 - port with SSL, used by majority of devices,
  2. 2015 - port without SSL, often used by home made Arduino/RPi devices.
Note: Double check that chosen port is free to use.

channel-type.label: Connected devices
channel-type.description: Indicates how many devices are connected to this server.
